pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sub-Pathway Mining Software // Use new methods to mine sub- pathway,but user need to prepare for xml format data of KEGG PATHWAY and store them in "xml" folder under "paths"(paths library is the default directory which is set by user) library,prepare KEGG pathway map data and store them in "png" folder under the "paths"(paths library is the default directory which is set by user) library in advance.
